T09bsu078_u:8110: sa śaśīva śiśuḥ kāle kalānilayatāṃ gataḥ /
T09bsu078_u:8124: vakrkraṃ na kṣamate madaṃ śaśamṛtaḥ kleśnāti kāntiḥ sudhām
T09bsu078_u:8127: līlāyāsyāḥ sahasā vilāsalaharīśoṣaṃ vidhatte rateḥ // KAvk_48.13 //
T09bsu078_u:8129: yasyā doṣamaye 'pyaho guṇavatā hāreṇa baddhā sthitiḥ /
T09bsu078_u:8131: lolākṣyāḥ kimapi praśāntanayane līnaṃ munīnāṃ manaḥ // KAvk_48.14 //
T09bsu078_u:8137: manastatraiva nikṣipya sā śūnyeva śanairyayau // KAvk_48.17 //
T09bsu078_u:8139: mīliteva nilīneva proṣiteva babhūva sā // KAvk_48.18 //
T09bsu078_u:8143: pradadhyau kurlabhām matvā tanayām cakravartinaḥ // KAvk_48.20 //
T09bsu078_u:8145: dhanyaḥ sa tāmavāpnoti latāṃ sukṛtaśākhinaḥ // KAvk_48.21 //
T09bsu078_u:8147: na jāne tāni puṇyāni yeṣāṃ tatsaṃgamaḥ phalam // KAvk_48.22 //
T09bsu078_u:8150: no vedmi kiṃ dhṛtiriyaṃ kimayaṃ vimohaḥ
T09bsu078_u:8151: kiṃ jīvitaṃ kimasubhiḥ sahaḥ viprayogaḥ // KAvk_48.23 //
T09bsu078_u:8155: nūnaṃ prāpya parājayaṃ vanamahīṃ bimba samālambate // KAvk_48.24 //
T09bsu078_u:8157: niśāṃ nināya saṃtyaktaḥ serṣyayeva sanidrayā // KAvk_48.25 //
T09bsu078_u:8160: sa tamūce vayaṃ putra rājño 'sya puravāsinah /
T09bsu078_u:8161: sa kathaṃ te duhitaraṃ cakravartī pradāsyati // KAvk_48.27 //
T09bsu078_u:8162: aśakyaṃ naiva kurvanti samīhante na durlabham /
T09bsu078_u:8163: asaṃbhāvyaṃ na bhāṣante mānakāmā manīṣiṇaḥ // KAvk_48.28 //
T09bsu078_u:8165: cintayan pārijātasya latām śuṣyati ṣaṭpadaḥ // KAvk_48.29 //
T09bsu078_u:8171: na cetaḥ kanyakānītaṃ samānetuṃ śaśāka saḥ // KAvk_48.32 //
T09bsu078_u:8175: sa hemamayamādāya draṣṭuṃ bhūmipatiṃ yayau // KAvk_48.34 //
T09bsu078_u:8177: praviśyaḥ praṇataḥ prītyai hemadantadvayaṃ dadau // KAvk_48.35 //
T09bsu078_u:8179: varaṃ gṛhāṇetyuktaśca sa na jagrāha kiṃcana // KAvk_48.36 //
T09bsu078_u:8181: aucityacārucaritaḥ priyaḥ kasya na niḥspṛhaḥ // KAvk_48.37 //
T09bsu078_u:8182: sa sadā darśane rājñaḥ kāñcanāṅgāni dantinaḥ /
T09bsu078_u:8187: na sahe prauravārgo hi bhavaṇīyo mahībhṛtām // KAvk_48.40 //
T09bsu078_u:8194: rājñṃ dṛkpātapātreṇa prāpyante yadi na śriyaḥ /
T09bsu078_u:8199: tadunnidraṃ samudrasya mudritaṃ bhavatā yaśaḥ // KAvk_48.46 //
T09bsu078_u:8203: janānāṃ nāsti dāridyaṃ draviṇaṃ yena mṛgyate // KAvk_48.48 //
T09bsu078_u:8204: dhanārthino na tu vayaṃ na ca sevādhikāriṇaḥ /
T09bsu078_u:8205: dhanaṃ dhanaṃ dhanadhiyāṃ māna eva manasvinām // KAvk_48.49 //
T09bsu078_u:8206: mīladguṇena parameśvarasevanena nurmūlatām sumanasāṃ sahasā gatānām /
T09bsu078_u:8207: dainyātpunaḥ kṛpaṇapaṇyapathe cyutānāṃ na sparśamātramapi sādhujanaḥ karoti // KAvk_48.50 //
T09bsu078_u:8215: kasyeṣṭaḥ priyasaṃgamāya vapuṣāṃ sevāmayo vikrayaḥ // KAvk_48.52 //
T09bsu078_u:8221: tamūce yadu tuṣṭo 'si sutā mahyaṃ pradīyatām // KAvk_48.55 //
T09bsu078_u:8230: kathaṃ prāptasya tasyāhaṃ prātardraṣṭ mukhaṃ puraḥ /
T09bsu078_u:8231: priyo 'pyapriyatāṃ yātaḥ sa me durlabhayecchayā // KAvk_48.60 //
T09bsu078_u:8233: vakti yāvanna dehīti tāvadgavati vallabhah // KAvk_48.61 //
T09bsu078_u:8241: hemahastinamāruhya prāptaḥ prāpsyasi me sutām // KAvk_48.65 //
T09bsu078_u:8243: na cāsau tadvirahitaḥ punarāyāti lajjayā // KAvk_48.66 //
T09bsu078_u:8252: ārūḍhe pṛthivīpāle na cacāla sa kuñjaraḥ /
T09bsu078_u:8255: dhanyo 'smīti vadan kanyāṃ dadau tasmai smaraśriyam // KAvk_48.72 //
T09bsu078_u:8265: na hi sāmānyapuṇyānāṃ pāko bhavati tadvidhaḥ // KAvk_48.77 //
T09bsu078_u:8269: na vidmaḥ kasyāyaṃ kuśalapariṇāmasya vibhavaḥ // KAvk_48.78 //
T09bsu078_u:8272: sa jātātaramāhūya sutāṃ ca sacivaiḥ saha /
T09bsu078_u:8273: bhagavantaṃ yayau draṣṭuṃ manasā prathamaṃ gataḥ // KAvk_48.80 //
T09bsu078_u:8275: upasṛtyaḥ nṛpaḥ padbhyāṃ bhagavantaṃ vyalokayat // KAvk_48.81 //
T09bsu078_u:8277: sutāṃ jāmātaraṃ cāsmai namro nāmnā nyavedayat // KAvk_48.82 //
T09bsu078_u:8279: papraccha rājā sarvajñaṃ bhagavantaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ // KAvk_48.83 //
T09bsu078_u:8281: haimeva dantināyāto bhagavan kena karmaṇā // KAvk_48.84 //
T09bsu078_u:8282: iyaṃ cīvarakanyā ca matsutāsya navā vadhūḥ /
T09bsu078_u:8285: tamūce bhūpate puṃsāṃ puṇyodbhūtā vibhūtayaḥ // KAvk_48.86 //
T09bsu078_u:8288: vipaśvī bhagavān pūrvaṃ sugataḥ saha bhikṣubhiḥ /
T09bsu078_u:8289: cacāra lokakṛpayā rājño bandhumataḥ pure // KAvk_48.88 //
T09bsu078_u:8291: vikrīḍāvartmani puraḥ kṛtvā dārumayaṃ gajam // KAvk_48.89 //
T09bsu078_u:8295: krīḍāgajaṃ nivedyāsmai praṇatau tasthatuḥ puraḥ // KAvk_48.91 //
T09bsu078_u:8308: yāte savismayaṃ rājñi kumāraḥ saha jāyayā /
T09bsu078_u:8309: kathyamānaṃ bhagavatā dharmaṃ śuśrāva śuddhadhīḥ // KAvk_48.98 //
T09bsu078_u:8313: abhimatamatha bhuktvā tatphalaṃ sadārāste vighanagaganakāntiṃ śāntimante bhajante // KAvk_48.100 //
